results.title: Responding to change
results.brief_description:
A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Against the Grain” in association with Partners in Grain (PING).
Penny Hendy describes her upbringing, her marriage as a “townie” to a “farmer” and her involvement with some 23 rural community organisations. As the women in her family before, Penny recognises the need to be resourceful, creative and flexible in response to change. Penny’s contribution to, and involvement with the Women in Grains has played a major role in her own life as well as the women she has mentored. Penny currently holds several high positions on various boards and continues to be a force within the rural community.

group.title: Against the grain: digital storytelling project

results.title: The Sacrifice
results.brief_description: A narrative of courage, family and a life saved. Dragush’s father was dying of kidney failure. His father’s sister, Lina, travelled half way across the world to Australia from Albania, leaving her home and family behind, so that she could help save her brother’s life by donating one of her own kidneys. This story is a dedication to Aunty Lina and the importance of family.

results.title: Ron's story
results.brief_description: A wife remembers her wonderful life with her husband, who can now no longer remember it with her. Created as part of the ‘Memory’s Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage’ workshop, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with Alzheimer’s Australia Vic and in partnership with VicHealth.

results.title: Pig too far gone
results.brief_description: Chief Kosher is having a hard time busting open a crime ring and nabbing the King Pin, when the cops he sends undercover find it impossible to go unnoticed. His only option is to send in loose-cannon McBurger, which could be his best or worst decision to date.

results.brief_description: Continuing from his ‘Truth Effect’ series, and the tradition of George Méliès, Daniel von Sturmer creates a miniature environment in which an everyday object behaves in unexpected ways.
